subject: Soccer
World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: Croatia kept its World Cup hopes alive by beating Cameroon, 4-0, in a game in which Alex Song was sent off for Cameroon, which will be going home after the group stage.
snippet: Croatia kept its World Cup hopes alive by beating Cameroon, 4-0, in a game in which Alex Song was sent off for Cameroon, which will be going home after the group stage.
